title: The BRIT Awards 2017 taken over by knicker flashing as Jade Thirlwall, Abbey Clancy and Charlotte Crosby all bare their underwear on the red carpet
text:
TV Magazine Baring almost all The BRIT Awards 2017 taken over by knicker flashing as Jade Thirlwall, Abbey Clancy and Charlotte Crosby all bare their underwear on the red carpet 
Pop star suffered a fashion faux pas as she showed a little too much skin BY Louise Randell, Senior Showbiz Reporter 22nd February 2017, 5:17 pm Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments LITTLE Mix’s Jade Thirlwall was among the stars who flashed a little too much flesh at The BRIT Awards 2017 as she accidentally showed off her knickers on the red carpet. 
Model Abbey Clancy and former Geordie Shore castmember Charlotte Crosby also joined the new trend by baring their underwear at the glitzy prizegiving. karwaitang8@gmail.com Jade Thirlwall gave fans an eyeful on the red carpet lia.toby.wenn@gmail.com She ended up fixing her frock with tape Rex Features 5 Little Mix all wore sexy outfits on the red carpet 
Jade wore a tie-up dress for the big night, and accidentally showed off a little too much skin as her black pants were left in display. 
She ended up having to fix her frock with tape as assistants rushed to help her cover up. 
The singer was not the only star who took part in some knicker flashing on the red carpet – model Abbey Clancy was also left pulling her dress down as her rising hemline left her pants on display. 
The Britain’s Next Top Model host was left red-faced when she accidentally showed off her pants. PA:Press Association Abbey Clancy accidentally showed off her black pants PA:Press Association
